analysis.description:
BitGuildToken (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#52-200) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#107-112)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol:
	Contract BitGuildWhitelist has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#217-218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BitGuildCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#306-328):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(whitelist.whitelist(beneficiary)) (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#310)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contributions (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#321-322)
	- weiRaised (/unique_contracts/0x4118d7f757ad5893b8fa2f95e067994e1f531371.sol#320-321)
